snippet: A new whistle-blower lawsuit has been filed against Infosys, the giant Indian outsourcing company, by a man who says he was harassed into quitting after he reported visa fraud by managers there.
abstract: Second whistle-blower lawsuit has been filed against Infosys, the giant Indian outsourcing company, by former employee Satya Dev Tripuraneni, who says he was harassed into quitting after he reported visa fraud by managers there.
lead_paragraph: A new whistle-blower lawsuit has been filed against Infosys, the giant Indian outsourcing company, by a man who says he was harassed into quitting after he reported visa fraud by managers there.

headline.seo: California: Infosys Faces 2nd Suit Over Visas
headline.main: California: Company Faces 2nd Suit Over Visas
headline.print_headline: California: Company Faces 2nd Suit Over Visas
